RelatedSentence: A serial conwoman , who used the police to warn off a journalist who was investigating her fraud , was jailed yesterday for 30 months .
A serial conwoman , who used the police to warn off a journalist who was investigating her fraud , was jailed yesterday for 30 months .

Neelam Desai , 33 , admitted to a string of frauds totalling more than £230,000 , including setting up a bogus travel agency as part of a Ponzi scheme which left one victim more than £150,000 out of pocket .

Neelam Desai , 33 , admitted to a string of frauds totalling more than £230,000 , including setting up a bogus travel agency as part of a Ponzi scheme which left one victim more than £150,000 out of pocket .
She was also suspected of setting up a fake dating website which was being investigated by Gareth Davies , 29 , a senior reporter with the Croydon Advertiser .
